channel.title: Keynote Talk / Seminar | EV / The modelers

item.title: Workshop on Advanced Computing and Analysis Techniques in Physics Research (ACAT)
item.description: Eugenio is invited speaker at the 23rd International Workshop on Advanced Computing and Analysis Techniques in Physics Research (ACAT).

item.title: BeSAFE
item.description: Eugenio is invited speaker at the satellite on Behavioral and Social Aspects in Fighting Epidemics.

item.title: International Conference on Complex Systems (CCS)
item.description: Eugenio is invited speaker at the main conference, Suprabhath will give a contributed talk in the epidemic modeling track.

item.title: Complex Networks - a satellite of StatPhys29
item.description: Eugenio is invited speaker and Claudio will give a contributed talk at the International Workshop on Complex Networks, a satellite event to StatPhys29, the leading international conference in statistical physics.

item.title: EU Innovation Day 2025 at Meta
item.description: Eugenio will speak ath the EU Innovation Day 2025 at Meta, to reflect upon how nontraditional open data and open-source AI can fuel innovation in research and public service delivery in the EU.

item.title: roundtable @ France Alumni Day - Quai d'Orsay
item.description: Eugenio will speak at a roundtable at the Soirée France Alumni Day at the Ministère de l’Europe et des Affairs Etrangers (Quai d’Orsay).

item.title: Seminar at the University of Lisbon
Seminar at the Central European University
Keynote talk at Complex Systems for the Most Vulnerable
item.description: I will be a keynote speaker at this satellite. I will address how data-rich mathematical modeling may help to unveil inequalities, and improve the welfare of those who are most vulnerable to, and burdened by, infectious disease epidemics.
